file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  contact:
    email: FactSearch.Team@factset.com
    name: FactSet Search Team
  description: The FactSet Search Answers API provides answers to search queries,
    reflecting the data shown within FactSet Search Answers, and allowing you to easily
    add financial data to your widgets, lookups, bots, and assistants. The API understands
    a fixed amount of search terms and returns structured data from FactSetâ€™s many
    data sources. Possible answers include Price of a Company, Top 10 Year-to-Date
    Gainers, Revenue per Passenger Mile, and many more.
  title: FactSet Search Answers API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: https://api.factset.com
security:
- FactSetApiKey: []
- FactSetOAuth2: []
paths:
  /search/answers/v1/data:
    get:
      description: Returns an answer to the specified query (if a valid answer exists).
        Returns the answer data only (as JSON), without any markup information.
      operationId: searchForDataAnswer
      parameters:
      - description: Query for desired answer (e.g., "fds price")
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: query
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataAnswerSuccessResponse'
          description: Request was successful.
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Missing or empty query.
        "401":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Missing or invalid authentication.
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Unhandled error occurred while processing the request.
      summary: Fetch FactSet answer in data format
      tags:
      - answers
      x-accepts: application/json
  /search/answers/v1/adaptive-card:
    get:
      description: Returns an answer to the specified query (if valid answer exists)
        in the Adaptive Card format (https://adaptivecards.io/).
      operationId: searchForAdaptiveCardAnswer
      parameters:
      - description: Query for desired answer (e.g., "fds price")
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: query
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Includes thumbnail of Adaptive Card in response
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: includeThumbnail
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      - description: Disables no-result answer responses (no-results and answer without
          data)
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: disableNoAnswerResponses
        required: false
        schema:
          default: true
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AdaptiveCardAnswerSuccessResponse'
          description: Request was successful.
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Missing or empty query.
        "401":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Missing or invalid authentication.
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerFailureResponse'
          description: Unhandled error occurred while processing the request.
      summary: Fetch FactSet answer in Adaptive Card format
      tags:
      - answers
      x-accepts: application/json
components:
  parameters:
    Query:
      description: Query for desired answer (e.g., "fds price")
      explode: true
      in: query
      name: query
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      style: form
    IncludeThumbnail:
      description: Includes thumbnail of Adaptive Card in response
      explode: true
      in: query
      name: includeThumbnail
      required: false
      schema:
        default: false
        type: boolean
      style: form
    DisableNoAnswerResponses:
      description: Disables no-result answer responses (no-results and answer without
        data)
      explode: true
      in: query
      name: disableNoAnswerResponses
      required: false
      schema:
        default: true
        type: boolean
      style: form
  schemas:
    DataAnswerSuccessResponse:
      example: {}
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataAnswerData'
      required:
      - data
      type: object
    DataAnswerData:
      oneOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Answer'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerWithoutData'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NoAnswersFound'
    AnswerFailureResponse:
      properties:
        errors:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          type: array
      required:
      - errors
      type: object
    Error:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        links:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorLink'
        detail:
          type: string
        source:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorSource'
      required:
      - code
      - id
      - title
      type: object
    ErrorLink:
      properties:
        about:
          type: string
      required:
      - about
      type: object
    ErrorSource:
      properties:
        pointer:
          type: string
        parameter:
          type: string
      type: object
    DataAnswer:
      properties:
        template:
          type: string
      required:
      - template
      type: object
    Answer:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataAnswer'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Answer_allOf'
    AnswerWithoutData:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NoAnswersFound'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerWithoutData_allOf'
    NoAnswersFound:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataAnswer'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NoAnswersFound_allOf'
    Fdc3Country:
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/CountryID'
      required:
      - name
      - type
      type: object
    Fdc3Instrument:
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        exchangeMic:
          type: string
        exchangeMicFds:
          type: string
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InstrumentID'
      required:
      - name
      - type
      type: object
    Fdc3Context:
      oneOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Fdc3Instrument'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Fdc3Country'
    CountryID:
      properties:
        ISOALPHA2:
          type: string
      type: object
    InstrumentID:
      properties:
        BBG:
          type: string
        CUSIP:
          type: string
        FDS_ID:
          type: string
        FDS_TICKER_REGION:
          type: string
        FDS_TICKER_EXCHANGE:
          type: string
        FIGI:
          type: string
        ISIN:
          type: string
        PERMID:
          type: string
        RIC:
          type: string
        SEDOL:
          type: string
        ticker:
          type: string
      type: object
    Template:
      properties:
        headline:
          type: string
        footer:
          type: string
        fdc3Context:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Fdc3Context'
      required:
      - headline
      type: object
    TemplateWithLinks:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks_allOf'
    LinkTextBlockTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LinkTextBlockTemplate_allOf'
    TextBlockFootingTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TextBlockFootingTemplate_allOf'
    PercentChangeLabelTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentChangeLabelTemplate_allOf'
    ValueChangeDateLabelTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueChangeDateLabelTemplate_allOf'
    RankedTableTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RankedTableTemplate_allOf'
    TableTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TableTemplate_allOf'
    TableTableTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TableTableTemplate_allOf'
    ValueLabelTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelTemplate_allOf'
    ValueLabelDateTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateTemplate_allOf'
    ColoredValueLabelDateTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ColoredValueLabelDateTemplate_allOf'
    ValueLabelDateTextBlockTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateTextBlockTemplate_allOf'
    ValueLabelDateDataPairListTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateDataPairListTemplate_allOf'
    LabelValueChangeLabelValueChangeTemplate:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateWithLinks'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LabelValueChangeLabelValueChangeTemplate_allOf'
    TemplateData:
      discriminator:
        propertyName: template
      oneOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LinkTextBlockTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TextBlockFootingTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentChangeLabelTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueChangeDateLabelTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RankedTableTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TableTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TableTableTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ColoredValueLabelDateTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateTextBlockTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueLabelDateDataPairListTemplate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LabelValueChangeLabelValueChangeTemplate'
    TitledTextBlock:
      properties:
        title:
          type: string
        content:
          type: string
      type: object
    ValueChange:
      properties:
        absoluteChange:
          type: string
        percentageChange:
          type: string
        color:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChangeColor'
      type: object
    PercentChange:
      properties:
        change:
          type: string
        color:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChangeColor'
      type: object
    ChangeColor:
      enum:
      - colorNeutral
      - colorPositive
      - colorNegative
      type: string
    ColoredValue:
      properties:
        text:
          type: string
        color:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueColor'
      type: object
    ValueColor:
      enum:
      - colorNone
      - colorBuy
      - colorHold
      - colorSell
      - colorOverweight
      - colorUnderweight
      type: string
    Table:
      properties:
        tableHeaders:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        tableRows:
          items:
            items:
              type: string
            type: array
          type: array
        tableFooters:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
      required:
      - tableRows
      type: object
    RankedTable:
      properties:
        headers:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        rows:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RankedTableRow'
          type: array
      required:
      - tableRows
      type: object
    RankedTableRow:
      properties:
        rank:
          type: number
        entity:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RankedTableEntity'
        applicationLink:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApplicationLink'
        additionalData:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
      required:
      - rank
      type: object
    RankedTableEntity:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        identifier:
          type: string
      type: object
    DataPair:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
      required:
      - label
      - value
      type: object
    ApplicationLink:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        workstationLink:
          type: string
        webLink:
          type: string
      required:
      - name
      - webLink
      - workstationLink
      type: object
    AdaptiveCardAnswerSuccessResponse:
      example:
        data:
        - null
        - null
      properties:
        data:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AdaptiveCardDataItem'
          type: array
      required:
      - data
      type: object
    AdaptiveCardDataItem:
      oneOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AdaptiveCard'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AdaptiveCardWithThumbnail'
    AdaptiveCardWithThumbnail:
      properties:
        adaptiveCard:
          description: JSON that matches [Adaptive Card](https://adaptivecards.io/explorer/)
            format.
          type: object
        thumbnail:
          description: JSON that matches [Thumbnail Card](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/task-modules-and-cards/cards/cards-reference#thumbnail-card)
            format.
          nullable: true
          type: object
      type: object
    AdaptiveCard:
      description: JSON that matches [Adaptive Card](https://adaptivecards.io/explorer/)
        format.
      type: object
    ThumbnailCard:
      description: JSON that matches [Thumbnail Card](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/task-modules-and-cards/cards/cards-reference#thumbnail-card)
        format.
      nullable: true
      type: object
    Answer_allOf:
      properties:
        templateData:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TemplateData'
        title:
          type: string
      required:
      - templateData
      - title
      type: object
    AnswerWithoutData_allOf_templateData:
      properties:
        fdc3Context:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Fdc3Context'
      type: object
    AnswerWithoutData_allOf:
      properties:
        title:
          type: string
        templateData:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/AnswerWithoutData_allOf_templateData'
      required:
      - title
      type: object
    NoAnswersFound_allOf:
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        querySuggestions:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
      required:
      - message
      - querySuggestions
      type: object
    TemplateWithLinks_allOf:
      properties:
        applicationLinks:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApplicationLink'
          type: array
      required:
      - headline
      type: object
    LinkTextBlockTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        link:
          type: string
        blurb:
          type: string
      type: object
    TextBlockFootingTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        body:
          type: string
        footing:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TitledTextBlock'
      type: object
    PercentChangeLabelTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        percentChange:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentChange'
        label:
          type: string
      type: object
    ValueChangeDateLabelTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        valueChange:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueChange'
        date:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
      type: object
    RankedTableTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        table:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RankedTable'
      type: object
    TableTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        table:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Table'
      type: object
    TableTableTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        table1:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Table'
        table2:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Table'
      type: object
    ValueLabelTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
      type: object
    ValueLabelDateTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
      type: object
    ColoredValueLabelDateTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ColoredValue'
        label:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
      type: object
    ValueLabelDateTextBlockTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
        blurb:
          type: string
      type: object
    ValueLabelDateDataPairListTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
        list:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataPair'
          type: array
      type: object
    LabelValueChangeLabelValueChangeTemplate_allOf:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        valueChange:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueChange'
        value2:
          type: string
        label2:
          type: string
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    FactSetOAuth2:
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          scopes: {}
          tokenUrl: https://auth.factset.com/as/token.oauth2
      type: oauth2
    FactSetApiKey:
      scheme: basic
      type: http

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/search/answers/v1/data": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: field data: oneOf: collect variants: oneOf[0]: allOf: field templateData: oneOf: collect variants: oneOf[0]: allOf: schema type mismatch:  and object
